Title: The Gladiator Special Issue
Text:
A Special Issue of The Gladiator Released Ahead of the Great Agon.

This new issue offers a look back at the storied history of past champions. From gripping duels to behind-the-scenes anecdotes, the magazine dives deep, especially in its extensive profile of current Ephor, Augusta.

But one year stands out for its omission.

That year's match ended on a strange note: the expected winner, a young girl from Ragunna, disappeared just before the award ceremony. Without receiving the victor’s medal, her win was never officially recognized.

"It’s unfortunate," the writer noted, "but without a proper conclusion, the result could never be confirmed. To this day, Mya’s standing remains a topic of debate."
